tavparsadswaiyeEnglish.English: <font color='#FFA500'>ikOankaar</font> satigur prasaadh ||
tavai prasaadh sava'ye ||
paatishaahee 10 ||
tavai prasaadh || sava'ye ||
sraavag su'dh samooh sidhaan <font color='#FFA500'>ke</font> dhekh firio ghar jog jatee ke ||
soor suraaradhan su'dh <font color='#FFA500'>sudhaadhik</font> sa(n)t samooh anek matee ke ||
saare hee dhes ko dhekh rahio <font color='#FFA500'>mat</font> kouoo na dhekheeat praanapatee ke ||
sree bhagavaan kee bhai kirapaa hoo <font color='#FFA500'>te</font> ek ratee bin ek ratee ke ||1||21||
maate mata(n)g jare jar <font color='#FFA500'>sa(n)g</font> anoop uta(n)g sura(n)g savaare ||
koT tura(n)g kura(n)g se <font color='#FFA500'>koodhat</font> paun ke gaun ko jaat nivaare ||
bhaaree bhujaan ke bhoop bhalee <font color='#FFA500'>bidh</font> niaavat sees na jaat bichaare ||
ete bhe ta kahaa bhe <font color='#FFA500'>bhoopat</font> a(n)t ko naa(n)ge hee paa(n)i padhaare ||2||22||
jeet firai sabh dhes dhisaan <font color='#FFA500'>ko</font> baajat ddol miradha(n)g nagaare ||
gu(n)jat <font color='#009900'>gooR</font> gajaan ke <font color='#FFA500'>su(n)dhar</font> hi(n)sat hai(n) hayaraaj hajaare ||
bhoot bhavi'kh bhavaan ke <font color='#FFA500'>bhoopat</font> kaun ganai nahee(n) jaat bichaare ||
sree pat sree bhagavaan bhaje <font color='#FFA500'>bin</font> a(n)t kau a(n)t ke dhaam sidhaare ||3||23||
teerath naan dhiaa dham <font color='#FFA500'>dhaan</font> su sa(n)jam nem anek bisekhai ||
bedh puraan kateb <font color='#FFA500'>kuraan</font> jameen jamaan sabaan ke pekhai ||
paun ahaar jatee jat <font color='#FFA500'>dhaar</font> sabai su bichaar hajaar k dhekhai ||
sree bhagavaan bhaje bin <font color='#FFA500'>bhoopat</font> ek ratee bin ek na lekhai ||4||24||
sa'udh sipaeh dhura(n)t <font color='#FFA500'>dhubaeh</font> su saaj sanaeh dhurajaan dhalai(n)ge ||
bhaaree gumaan bhare man <font color='#FFA500'>mai(n)</font> kar parabat pa(n)kh <font color='#009900'>hale</font> na halai(n)ge ||
tor areen maror <font color='#FFA500'>mavaasan</font> maate mata(n)gan maan malai(n)ge ||
sree pat sree bhagavaan kirapaa <font color='#FFA500'>bin</font> tiaag jahaan nidhaan chalai(n)ge ||5||25||
beer apaar badde <font color='#FFA500'>bariaar</font> abichaareh saar kee dhaar bhachha'yaa ||
torat dhes mali(n)dh <font color='#FFA500'>mavaasan</font> maate gajaan ke maan mala'yaa ||
gaaRhe gaRhaan ko <font color='#FFA500'>toRanahaar</font> su baatan hee(n) chak chaar lava'yaa ||
saahib sree sabh ko <font color='#FFA500'>siranaik</font> jaachak anek su ek dhiva'yaa ||6||26||
dhaanav dhev fani(n)dh <font color='#FFA500'>nisaachar</font> bhoot bhavikh bhavaan japai(n)ge ||
jeev jite jal mai thal <font color='#FFA500'>mai</font> pal hee pal mai sabh thaap thapai(n)ge ||
pu(n)n prataapan baadd jait <font color='#FFA500'>dhun</font> paapan ke bahu pu(n)j khapai(n)ge ||
saadh samooh prasa(n)n firai(n) <font color='#FFA500'>jag</font> satr sabhai avilok chapai(n)ge ||7||27||
maanav i(n)dhr gaji(n)dhr <font color='#FFA500'>naraadhap</font> jauan tiralok ko raaj karai(n)ge ||
koT isanaan gajaadhik <font color='#FFA500'>dhaan</font> anek sua(n)bar saaj barai(n)ge ||
braham mahesar bisan <font color='#FFA500'>sacheepat</font> a(n)t fase jam faas parai(n)ge ||
je nar sree pat ke pras hai(n) <font color='#FFA500'>pag</font> te nar fer na dheh dharai(n)ge ||8||28||
kahaa bhayo jo dhouoo lochan moo(n)dh <font color='#FFA500'>kai</font> baiTh rahio bak dhiaan lagaio ||
nhaat firio le'ee saat <font color='#FFA500'>samudhran</font> lok gayo paralok gavaio ||
baas keeo bikhiaan so(n) baiTh <font color='#FFA500'>kai</font> aaise hee aaise su bais bitaio ||
saach kaho(n) sun leh <font color='#FFA500'>sabhai</font> jin prem keeo tin hee prabh paio ||9||29||
kaahoo lai paahan pooj dharayo <font color='#FFA500'>sir</font> kaahoo lai li(n)g gare laTakaio ||
kaahoo lakhio har avaachee dhisaa <font color='#FFA500'>meh</font> kaahoo pachhaeh ko sees nivaio ||
kouoo butaan ko poojat hai <font color='#FFA500'>pas</font> kouoo mritaan ko poojan dhaio ||
koor kriaa urajhio sabh hee <font color='#FFA500'>jag</font> sree bhagavaan ko bhedh na paio ||10||30||
kouoo butaan ko poojat hai <font color='#FFA500'>pas</font> kouoo mritaan ko poojan dhaio ||
koor kriaa urajhio sabh hee <font color='#FFA500'>jag</font> sree bhagavaan ko bhedh na paio ||10||30||
